806450.name: Fantasy Grounds - Fantasy Token Pack by Joshua Watmough (Token Pack)
806450.description:
Fantasy Token Pack by Joshua Watmough

This token pack of hand drawn and painted images brings the most classic and fundamental creatures of typical fantasy settings to your adventures. Designed to compliment all my map packs for a complete and cohesive experience. These tokens were created with high resolution images to ensure that not only will they look good when zoomed out but up close as well.
This pack includes the following tokens:
  • Bear
  • Bugbear
  • Flesh Golem
  • Giant Frog
  • Giant Rat
  • Giant Centipede
  • Giant Owl
  • Giant Toad
  • Gnoll
  • Goblin
  • Hag
  • Hobgoblin
  • Hook Horror
  • Ogre
  • Orc
  • Owlbear
  • Spider
  • Wolf
  • Zombie
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Joshua Watmough
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
